casebody.data:
The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. John E. Lofthouse, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 59217;First District (5th Division)March 15, 1974.

DRUCKER, J., took no part.

James J. Doherty, Public Defender, of Chicago (William Lebovitz and Ronald P. Alwin, Assistant Public Defenders, of counsel), for appellant.Bernard Carey, State’s Attorney, of Chicago (Kenneth L. Gillis and Linda West Conley, Assistant State’s Attorneys, of counsel), for the People. PER CURIAM.
